name: Carex Bath Seat And Shower Chair with Backrest for Seniors, Bath Chair For Elderly, Disabled, Handicap, and Injured Persons, Supports Up To 400lbs, Shower Seat For Inside Shower, Made in USA
short_description: Plastic

Relax Safely with Our Shower Chair: Experience comfort with our shower chair for elderly and disabled. This versatile bath chair doubles as a perfect shower seat for inside shower or shower stool, designed for adults who may be at risk. It also serves as an ideal handicap shower chair and bath bench for individuals needing extra support.

Patented Exact Level Height: Our adjustable height shower chairs feature patented Exact Level legs, making it effortless to customize the shower bench to your perfect height without tools. This shower chair disassembles quickly for convenient storage or travel, ideal for those seeking a folding shower chair or small shower chair solution.

Durable & High-Capacity Design: Built for lasting durability, our shower chairs and shower benches for inside shower are rigorously tested to support up to 400 lbs, including bariatric needs. We specialize in building reliable shower seats for the elderly and disabled, ensuring a robust tub chair you can buy with confidence.

Fits Most Bathtubs & Showers: This versatile bathroom chair is designed to fit most standard bathtubs and shower stalls. The bathtub chair features adjustable legs that conform to tubs and showers with curved bottoms, providing an extra-large seating area for comfortable use as a tub bench or shower bench seat.

Proudly Made in the USA: Our bath & shower safety seating & transfer benches are proudly Made in the USA, reflecting our commitment to quality and safety. American workers craft these essential shower seats for adults inside showers, shower benches for the disabled, and bath chairs, ensuring a reliable and durable tub seat for your home.

name: Medline Transfer Bench for Bathtubs and Showers, Adjustable Shower Bench and Bath Seat For Seniors and adults, Slip-resistant Feet, Heavy-Duty 400 lb. Weight Capacity, Tool-Free Assembly
short_description: Steel

HEAVY DUTY BATH AND SHOWER BENCH—For seniors and mobility-impaired individuals; use as tub transfer bench or bath seat for easy entry and exit; high-strength, rust-resistant aluminum frame; 400 lb. weight capacity; 11 lb.

EASY ADJUSTABLE HEIGHT SETTINGS AND REVERSIBLE BACKREST – Easy push-button design for simple, custom seat height adjustment from 17.5-22”. Reversible backrest fits on either side of seat to accommodate any shower or tub.
BACKREST and ARM REST – Get extra stability and support when sitting down or getting up. Reversible backrest can be positioned on either side to fit most tubs; Stationary arm rest stays on one side.
SLIP RESISTANT FEET—Slip-resistant feet help prevent sliding outside the tub; wide, suction cup feet add security in the tub
TOOL-FREE ASSEMBLY—Simple tool-free, locking, push-button assembly; seat dimensions: 16"(D) x 26.5"(W) x 17.5-22"(H); overall width: 32"; overall depth: 18"; overall height (with backrest) 32.5-36.5”
product_description: The Medline bathtub transfer bench for seniors and mobility impaired individuals provides customized assistance for showering and bathing. This durable, heavy-duty bench has a weight capacity of 400 lbs., and securely positions across the tub for easy transfer in and out of baths and showers. Adjustable seat height from 17.5-22.5” allows for a custom fit at half-inch increments. The backrest can switch from either side of the seat to accommodate any size shower or tub; a side arm comes standard for stability and leverage when sitting or standing up. Wide suction cup feet inside the tub grip securely to provide stability and confidence. Slip-resistant rubber feet outside the tub prevent sliding. The seat and backrest have convenient drain holes. Easy, tool-free assembly; overall dimensions 32”L x 18”W x 32.5- 36.5” (includes backrest). With over 100 years servicing the healthcare industry, you can trust Medline for accessible and independent bathing.
